name: Acorn Wars the sweet taste of conquest
name_original: Acorn Wars the sweet taste of conquest
description:
This is a single screen danmaku with waves and bosses.

The full game is taking a while so a mode that is build in the game as a sub game mode called "The Training Program" has been made a stand alone to hold gamers over.

The game has seen many updates till this stand-alone launch.

Alt. site:
